Title: Relates to annual reporting requirements for guardians in certain circumstances
Summary: Allows the court to waive some or all of the requirements of the annual report, or impose additional requirements, which guardians for personal needs or property management are obliged to file annually.
LawCode: Amd ยง81.31, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to annual reporting requirements for guardians in certain circumstances
